title: El Piano
typeOfFood: Vegan, Mediterranean, Fast food, Take-out, Catering, Spanish
description: Vegan restaurant that re-opened in 2016 after moving from c/ Gran Capitan 7 Bajo. Takeaway providing vegan, gluten-free food served in biodegradable pine boats; fleets and armadas are also available. Guests eat standing at the bar. Complimentary herbal infusions. Offers cooking classes.
